name: Barry
short_description: Barry is an application suite for interfacing with the RIM BlackBerry Handheld. It comes with command line tools for exploring and managing the device, and a GUI for making quick backups. This project's goal is to create an easy to use desktop experience and fully functional syncing mechanism on Linux, BSD/Mac, and others, based on its portable C++ library.

screenshots.caption: Barry Desktop 0.18.3 main screen, running on Fedora 16
A particularly busy Barry Desktop 0.18.3 Sync screen
